verses.verse: Then the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3059>Jehoahaz<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>, and made him <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H1>father<s%>'s stead in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Joahaz <S%H3099><s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>; and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5493>deposed<s%> him at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H6064>fined<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> made <S%H471>Eliakim<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> over <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H5437>changed<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%>. And <S%H5224>Neco<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3099>Joahaz<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>, and <S%H935>carried<s%> him to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>; and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%>.

Against him came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and <S%H631>bound<s%> him in <S%H5178>fetters<s%>, to <S%H3212>carry<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> also <S%H935>carried<s%> of the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> them in his <S%H1964>temple<s%> at <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%>, and his <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which he <S%H6213>did<s%>, and that which was <S%H4672>found<s%> in <S%H3789>him<s%>, behold, they are written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: and <S%H3078>Jehoiachin<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>stead<s%>.

Jehoiachin <S%H3078><s%> was <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>; and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And at the <S%H8666>return<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, with the <S%H2532>goodly<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and made <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> over <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>; and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>:

and he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%>; he <S%H3665>humbled<s%> not himself <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> speaking from the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And he also <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%>, who had made him <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H430>God<s%>: but he <S%H7185>stiffened<s%> his <S%H6203>neck<s%>, and <S%H553>hardened<s%> his <S%H3824>heart<s%> against <S%H7725>turning<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Moreover all the <S%H8269>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> <S%H4604>very<s%> <S%H7235>greatly<s%> after all the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>; and they <S%H2930>polluted<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> which he had <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, <S%H7971>sent<s%> to them <S%H3027>by<s%> his <S%H4397>messengers<s%>, rising up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%>, because he had <S%H2550>compassion<s%> on his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and on his <S%H4583>dwelling-place<s%>:

but they <S%H3931>mocked<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H959>despised<s%> his <S%H1697>words<s%>, and <S%H8591>scoffed<s%> at his <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, until the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5927>arose<s%> against his <S%H5971>people<s%>, till there was no <S%H4832>remedy<s%>.

Therefore he <S%H5927>brought<s%> upon them the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, who <S%H2026>slew<s%> their young <S%H970>men<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>, and had no <S%H2550>compassion<s%> upon young <S%H970>man<s%> or <S%H1330>virgin<s%>, old <S%H2205>man<s%> or <S%H3486>hoary-headed<s%>: he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them all into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6996>small<s%>, and the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and of his <S%H8269>princes<s%>, all these he <S%H935>brought<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

And they <S%H8313>burnt<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and brake <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> all the <S%H759>palaces<s%> thereof with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> all the <S%H4261>goodly<s%> vessels <S%H3627>thereof<s%>.

And them that had <S%H7611>escaped<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword<s%> carried he <S%H1540>away<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>; and they were <S%H5650>servants<s%> to him and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> until the <S%H4427>reign<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%>:

to <S%H4390>fulfil<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, until the <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H7521>enjoyed<s%> its <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>: for as long <S%H3117>as<s%> it lay <S%H8074>desolate<s%> it kept <S%H7673>sabbath<s%>, to <S%H4390>fulfil<s%> threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

Now in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> might be <S%H3615>accomplished<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> stirred <S%H5782>up<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%>, so that he made a <S%H5674>proclamation<s%> throughout all his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>, and put it also in <S%H4385>writing<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%>, All the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> hath <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6485>me<s%>; and he hath charged me to <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, which is in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>. Whosoever there is among you of all his <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> be with <S%H5927>him<s%>, and let him go up.
